title: Just the Tipsy
description: A fun, interactive drinking game for you and your friends where either you follow the instructions, or you drink!
turns: has to lick the face of
has to finish the drink of
has to keep his/her hand for 5 turns on the lap of
has to interlock toes for 2 turns with
has to drink for 3 turns every time with
has to finish their drink with
has to hold hands for 5 turns with
has to play never have I ever (loser drinks) with
has to have a thumb war (loser drinks) with
has to have a staring contest (loser drinks) with
has to shotgun a beer (slower one drinks again) with
has to sit for 2 turns on the lap of
has to kiss the butt of
has to hold hands for 2 turns with
has to link arms for 5 turns with
has to make a drink for
has to take a shot with
